item.title: Security
item.description: AppsCode addresses security as a very important factor and takes best possible measure to ensure secured services. AppsCode maintains best practises to secure users from vulnerabilities using security controls over data and updates security features on regular basis. Reporting Security Issues If you notice any vulnerabilities in AppsCode services, immediately report by email to security@appscode.com with the details. AppsCode appreciates working with bug reporter(s) to fix bug promptly. You can report vulnerabilities securely using the following PGP key.
